module-option.name: principalsQuery
module-option.value: SELECT PASSWORD FROM ITC_USER_PROFILE WHERE USER_NAME = ?

module-option.name: rolesQuery
module-option.value: SELECT a.VALUE, 'Roles' FROM BV_ENUM_VALUES a, BV_USER_ROLE b WHERE (a.INT_CODE = b.USER_ROLE) AND (a.TYPE_NAME = 'ROLE') AND (b.USER_ID =(SELECT USER_ID FROM BV_USER WHERE USER_ALIAS = ?))
